pr_title: Polish container image extensions and doc

timeline.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: I don't think this is an improvement to be honest
replies.author: geoand

timeline.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: I dunno if it's worth having an info for that.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: I don't agree with the proposed change, but I do think that a log message should be used. After all the registry is Optional so when it's not set the user should know that some default was used
replies.author: geoand
